80 94 49 42 10 69 13 15 82 85 

80 94 49 42 10 69 13 15 82 85 
80 82 49 42 10 69 13 15 94 85 (94>85) 
80 82 49 42 10 69 13 15 85 94 (swap, mid: 8)

80 82 49 42 10 69 13 15 85 94 (select left part for 9th large num)
80 82 49 42 10 69 13 15 
10 82 49 42 80 69 13 15  (10<15)
10 13 49 42 80 69 82 15  (13<15)
10 13 15 42 80 69 82 49  (swap, mid: 2)
